content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":252952,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍陣地の隙間をうまく通り抜けてランス達はバボラの足元まできた","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others skillfully passed through the gaps in the demon army's stronghold and reached Babora's feet."},{"lineNumber":252953,"originalJapaneseLine":"攻撃をしかけます","translatedEnglishLine":"They launched an attack."},{"lineNumber":252954,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":252955,"originalJapaneseLine":"数ターンで自動的に戦闘終了（体力の半分も削れないイメージ）","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle ended automatically after several turns (they couldn't even cut half of the health)."},{"lineNumber":252956,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、堅い足だ。なかなか倒せない","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, tough legs. Can't seem to take them down easily."},{"lineNumber":252957,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラの声が上から聞こえる、んー、いたい・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora's voice could be heard from above, 'Ugh, that hurts...'"},{"lineNumber":252958,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして動き出す。足がランス達の元から消えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then it started moving. The legs disappeared from where Lance and the others were."},{"lineNumber":252959,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ・・逃げやがる","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... it's running away."},{"lineNumber":252960,"originalJapaneseLine":"追いかけようにも魔人バボラの歩幅は数十メートル、数歩であっというまに","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if they tried to chase, demon Babora's stride was tens of meters; with a few steps, in no time..."},{"lineNumber":252961,"originalJapaneseLine":"遠くにいかれてしましった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It had already gotten far away."},{"lineNumber":252962,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうしているうちに魔物が周囲にどんどんやってくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, monsters kept coming around increasingly."},{"lineNumber":252963,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、らちがあかん、撤退","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, this is hopeless, retreat!"},{"lineNumber":252964,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラングバウに戻ったランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others returned to Langbau."},{"lineNumber":252965,"originalJapaneseLine":"正攻法では魔人バボラを倒すのは難しい、うーんと考えるランス。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s difficult to defeat demon Babora by straightforward means; Lance thought hard."},{"lineNumber":252966,"originalJapaneseLine":"強さでは俺様の方が上だ、大きさだけの問題で倒しきれない","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m stronger than him; it’s just a matter of size that I can’t fully defeat him."},{"lineNumber":252967,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、俺も巨大化して対抗しよう。同じ大きさなら負けない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I’ll also grow huge to counter him. If we’re the same size, I won’t lose."},{"lineNumber":252968,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルはそんな魔法は知らない、クルックーも無いですねという","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheel said she doesn’t know such magic, and even Kurukku said there’s none like that."},{"lineNumber":252969,"originalJapaneseLine":"にやにやしているミラクル、自分に声がかかるのを待っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Miracle was grinning, waiting for someone to call on him."},{"lineNumber":252970,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨大化の魔法、ミラクルが知っている　３分間巨人になれる魔法、自分が作った","translatedEnglishLine":"The magic of growing huge, Miracle knows it—a spell to become a giant for three minutes, which he made himself."},{"lineNumber":252971,"originalJapaneseLine":"材料は手元にない、保存が聞かない物なのだ、このヘルマンの奥地ツングース平原に生えている","translatedEnglishLine":"The ingredients aren’t on hand; they’re perishable. They grow in the deep Tungus plains of Helman."},{"lineNumber":252972,"originalJapaneseLine":"２−４キノコだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Two to four mushrooms."},{"lineNumber":252973,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、それを取りにいこうとランス達は出かける","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, Lance and the others set out to fetch them."},{"lineNumber":252974,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、魔軍、バボラの部下達","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the demon army, Babora’s subordinates."},{"lineNumber":252975,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物将軍１体をバボラ親衛隊の隊長として出して下さい、性格任せます","translatedEnglishLine":"Please send out one monster general as the captain of Babora’s guards; personality is up to you."},{"lineNumber":252976,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼中心の愚痴で、状況説明とします","translatedEnglishLine":"Centered on him, complaints will serve as the situation explanation."},{"lineNumber":252977,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスからの作戦指示、バボラあたま悪いからなかなか理解出来ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Operational orders from Caybris, but Babora is stupid and can't understand them easily."},{"lineNumber":252978,"originalJapaneseLine":"大将軍ルメイからも指示が来ている、バボラをバカにした態度","translatedEnglishLine":"Orders also came from Great General Lumei, with a mocking attitude toward Babora."},{"lineNumber":252979,"originalJapaneseLine":"本来、魔人直轄の親衛隊の方が格上のはずなのにルメイが上から目線でムカツク","translatedEnglishLine":"Originally, the direct demon lord’s guards should be superior, but Lumei looks down on Babora, which is irritating."},{"lineNumber":252980,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンク様の部隊には下手に出ているらしいぜとかも","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, Babora acts submissively toward Kesselrink-sama’s troops as well."},{"lineNumber":252981,"originalJapaneseLine":"先日、人間の特攻部隊がバボラ様の足に取り付いて少し怪我をさせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The other day, a human suicide squad attached to Babora-sama’s foot and caused a slight injury."},{"lineNumber":252982,"originalJapaneseLine":"無敵結界のあるバボラ様が怪我など有り得ないのだが、何かの間違いかもしれない","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora-sama has an invincible barrier, so injury is impossible, maybe it was a mistake."},{"lineNumber":252983,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんにしろ人間どもにそこまで近づかれたのは我々のミス、以後、警戒を怠らないようにとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, it was our mistake to let humans get that close; don’t neglect vigilance in the future."},{"lineNumber":252984,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この魔物将軍、バボラが上司だし、バカだし、困っているが","translatedEnglishLine":"This monster general is troubled because Babora is his boss and is stupid."},{"lineNumber":252985,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それでも上司として守ろうとしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Still, he tries to protect him as his superior."},{"lineNumber":252986,"originalJapaneseLine":"　\t","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":252987,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラが起きる、うーーー、飯。飯まだか","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora wakes up, 'Uhhh, food... is it ready yet?'"},{"lineNumber":252988,"originalJapaneseLine":"さっき食べましたよー","translatedEnglishLine":"You just ate earlier."},{"lineNumber":252989,"originalJapaneseLine":"そっか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I see..."},{"lineNumber":252990,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーっと、何すればいいんだっけ？","translatedEnglishLine":"Um, what am I supposed to do again?"},{"lineNumber":252991,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、西の方角に進んで下さい、そ、そっちです。で人間達の砦があるので潰して下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, please advance westward, that’s right. There’s a human fortress there, so please crush it."},{"lineNumber":252992,"originalJapaneseLine":"あ、あーい、わかった。いってくるだー","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, okay, got it. I’m heading out."},{"lineNumber":252993,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラングバウの様子","translatedEnglishLine":"The situation in Langbau."},{"lineNumber":252994,"originalJapaneseLine":"ペルエレ","translatedEnglishLine":"Peruere."},{"lineNumber":252995,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはどうしたの、早く魔人やっつけてよ。怖いじゃない。","translatedEnglishLine":"What happened to Lance? Hurry and defeat the demon lord. It’s scary, you know."},{"lineNumber":252996,"originalJapaneseLine":"やっぱ逃げようよ・・（一人で逃げるのが怖いので巻き込もうとするペルエレ）","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s run away after all... (Peruere tries to involve others because she’s scared to run alone.)"},{"lineNumber":252997,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも何かあって逃げられない","translatedEnglishLine":"But if something happens, we won’t be able to escape."},{"lineNumber":252998,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーラが出てもいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s fine if Sheila steps out."},{"lineNumber":252999,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラングバウの様子","translatedEnglishLine":"The situation in Langbau."},{"lineNumber":253000,"originalJapaneseLine":"クリームは戦況を見ながら思う、魔軍の大軍に押されて確かに厳しい","translatedEnglishLine":"Cream thought while watching the battle situation that being pressed by the large demon army is certainly tough."},{"lineNumber":253001,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、先の革命で兵を失う数が少なく済んだおかげて持ちこたえている","translatedEnglishLine":"However, thanks to losing only a few soldiers in the previous revolution, they are holding out."},{"lineNumber":253002,"originalJapaneseLine":"もし革命がなく腐敗した軍部だと一撃で崩壊していたし、革命で多数の兵士が","translatedEnglishLine":"If there was no revolution and the corrupt military remained, they would have collapsed at once, and many soldiers in the revolution..."},{"lineNumber":253003,"originalJapaneseLine":"死んでいた場合も当然駄目だった、あの革命は奇跡の成功であった","translatedEnglishLine":"If many died, it would also have been a failure; that revolution was a miraculous success."},{"lineNumber":253004,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの革命で死んだ同志達の死を無駄にしない為にも我々は勝たねばいけない","translatedEnglishLine":"To not waste the deaths of comrades who died in that revolution, we must win."},{"lineNumber":253005,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、前線のヘルマン軍","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the Hermann army at the front lines."},{"lineNumber":253006,"originalJapaneseLine":"総司令官ヒューバート","translatedEnglishLine":"Commander-in-chief Hubert."},{"lineNumber":253007,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロレックス、ランスが来た事を知り喜ぶ","translatedEnglishLine":"Rolex was glad to hear that Lance had arrived."},{"lineNumber":253008,"originalJapaneseLine":"真田、なら例の作戦は不要になりますかね？","translatedEnglishLine":"Sanada asked, 'Then, is that certain plan unnecessary?'"},{"lineNumber":253009,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、継続して準備してくれ（落とし穴作戦の伏線）","translatedEnglishLine":"No, continue preparing it (foreshadowing of the pitfall plan)."},{"lineNumber":253010,"originalJapaneseLine":"雹が降ってくる平原、ファンタジーぽい謎の危険地帯","translatedEnglishLine":"A plain where hail falls, a mysterious dangerous area with a fantasy-like atmosphere."},{"lineNumber":253011,"originalJapaneseLine":"いていて、と降ってくるヒョウが痛い","translatedEnglishLine":"Ouch, ouch, the falling hail is painful."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍陣地の隙間をうまく通り抜けてランス達はバボラの足元まできた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others skillfully passed through the gaps in the demon army's stronghold and reached Babora's feet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃をしかけます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They launched an attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数ターンで自動的に戦闘終了（体力の半分も削れないイメージ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle ended automatically after several turns (they couldn't even cut half of the health).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、堅い足だ。なかなか倒せない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, tough legs. Can't seem to take them down easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラの声が上から聞こえる、んー、いたい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora's voice could be heard from above, 'Ugh, that hurts...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして動き出す。足がランス達の元から消えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then it started moving. The legs disappeared from where Lance and the others were.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・逃げやがる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... it's running away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追いかけようにも魔人バボラの歩幅は数十メートル、数歩であっというまに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if they tried to chase, demon Babora's stride was tens of meters; with a few steps, in no time...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠くにいかれてしましった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It had already gotten far away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうしているうちに魔物が周囲にどんどんやってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, monsters kept coming around increasingly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、らちがあかん、撤退
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, this is hopeless, retreat!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウに戻ったランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others returned to Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正攻法では魔人バボラを倒すのは難しい、うーんと考えるランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s difficult to defeat demon Babora by straightforward means; Lance thought hard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強さでは俺様の方が上だ、大きさだけの問題で倒しきれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m stronger than him; it’s just a matter of size that I can’t fully defeat him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、俺も巨大化して対抗しよう。同じ大きさなら負けない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I’ll also grow huge to counter him. If we’re the same size, I won’t lose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルはそんな魔法は知らない、クルックーも無いですねという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel said she doesn’t know such magic, and even Kurukku said there’s none like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: にやにやしているミラクル、自分に声がかかるのを待っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle was grinning, waiting for someone to call on him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大化の魔法、ミラクルが知っている　３分間巨人になれる魔法、自分が作った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magic of growing huge, Miracle knows it—a spell to become a giant for three minutes, which he made himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 材料は手元にない、保存が聞かない物なのだ、このヘルマンの奥地ツングース平原に生えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ingredients aren’t on hand; they’re perishable. They grow in the deep Tungus plains of Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２−４キノコだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two to four mushrooms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、それを取りにいこうとランス達は出かける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, Lance and the others set out to fetch them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍、バボラの部下達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the demon army, Babora’s subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍１体をバボラ親衛隊の隊長として出して下さい、性格任せます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please send out one monster general as the captain of Babora’s guards; personality is up to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼中心の愚痴で、状況説明とします
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Centered on him, complaints will serve as the situation explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスからの作戦指示、バボラあたま悪いからなかなか理解出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Operational orders from Caybris, but Babora is stupid and can't understand them easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍ルメイからも指示が来ている、バボラをバカにした態度
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Orders also came from Great General Lumei, with a mocking attitude toward Babora.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来、魔人直轄の親衛隊の方が格上のはずなのにルメイが上から目線でムカツク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, the direct demon lord’s guards should be superior, but Lumei looks down on Babora, which is irritating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンク様の部隊には下手に出ているらしいぜとかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, Babora acts submissively toward Kesselrink-sama’s troops as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先日、人間の特攻部隊がバボラ様の足に取り付いて少し怪我をさせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The other day, a human suicide squad attached to Babora-sama’s foot and caused a slight injury.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無敵結界のあるバボラ様が怪我など有り得ないのだが、何かの間違いかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora-sama has an invincible barrier, so injury is impossible, maybe it was a mistake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんにしろ人間どもにそこまで近づかれたのは我々のミス、以後、警戒を怠らないようにとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, it was our mistake to let humans get that close; don’t neglect vigilance in the future.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この魔物将軍、バボラが上司だし、バカだし、困っているが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This monster general is troubled because Babora is his boss and is stupid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも上司として守ろうとしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, he tries to protect him as his superior.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラが起きる、うーーー、飯。飯まだか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora wakes up, 'Uhhh, food... is it ready yet?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっき食べましたよー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You just ate earlier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そっか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーっと、何すればいいんだっけ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, what am I supposed to do again?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、西の方角に進んで下さい、そ、そっちです。で人間達の砦があるので潰して下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, please advance westward, that’s right. There’s a human fortress there, so please crush it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、あーい、わかった。いってくるだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, okay, got it. I’m heading out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウの様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The situation in Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペルエレ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peruere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはどうしたの、早く魔人やっつけてよ。怖いじゃない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happened to Lance? Hurry and defeat the demon lord. It’s scary, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱ逃げようよ・・（一人で逃げるのが怖いので巻き込もうとするペルエレ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s run away after all... (Peruere tries to involve others because she’s scared to run alone.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも何かあって逃げられない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But if something happens, we won’t be able to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラが出てもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s fine if Sheila steps out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウの様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The situation in Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリームは戦況を見ながら思う、魔軍の大軍に押されて確かに厳しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cream thought while watching the battle situation that being pressed by the large demon army is certainly tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、先の革命で兵を失う数が少なく済んだおかげて持ちこたえている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, thanks to losing only a few soldiers in the previous revolution, they are holding out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし革命がなく腐敗した軍部だと一撃で崩壊していたし、革命で多数の兵士が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there was no revolution and the corrupt military remained, they would have collapsed at once, and many soldiers in the revolution...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死んでいた場合も当然駄目だった、あの革命は奇跡の成功であった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If many died, it would also have been a failure; that revolution was a miraculous success.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの革命で死んだ同志達の死を無駄にしない為にも我々は勝たねばいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To not waste the deaths of comrades who died in that revolution, we must win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、前線のヘルマン軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the Hermann army at the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総司令官ヒューバート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Commander-in-chief Hubert.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロレックス、ランスが来た事を知り喜ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rolex was glad to hear that Lance had arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真田、なら例の作戦は不要になりますかね？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sanada asked, 'Then, is that certain plan unnecessary?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、継続して準備してくれ（落とし穴作戦の伏線）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, continue preparing it (foreshadowing of the pitfall plan).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雹が降ってくる平原、ファンタジーぽい謎の危険地帯
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A plain where hail falls, a mysterious dangerous area with a fantasy-like atmosphere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いていて、と降ってくるヒョウが痛い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ouch, ouch, the falling hail is painful.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Can't seem to take them down easily."},{"lineNumber":252957,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラの声が上から聞こえる、んー、いたい・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora's voice could be heard from above, 'Ugh, that hurts...'"},{"lineNumber":252958,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして動き出す。足がランス達の元から消えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then it started moving. The legs disappeared from where Lance and the others were."},{"lineNumber":252959,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ・・逃げやがる","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... it's running away."},{"lineNumber":252960,"originalJapaneseLine":"追いかけようにも魔人バボラの歩幅は数十メートル、数歩であっというまに","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if they tried to chase, demon Babora's stride was tens of meters; with a few steps, in no time..."},{"lineNumber":252961,"originalJapaneseLine":"遠くにいかれてしましった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It had already gotten far away."},{"lineNumber":252962,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうしているうちに魔物が周囲にどんどんやってくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, monsters kept coming around increasingly."},{"lineNumber":252963,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、らちがあかん、撤退","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, this is hopeless, retreat!"},{"lineNumber":252964,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラングバウに戻ったランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others returned to Langbau."},{"lineNumber":252965,"originalJapaneseLine":"正攻法では魔人バボラを倒すのは難しい、うーんと考えるランス。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s difficult to defeat demon Babora by straightforward means; Lance thought hard."},{"lineNumber":252966,"originalJapaneseLine":"強さでは俺様の方が上だ、大きさだけの問題で倒しきれない","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m stronger than him; it’s just a matter of size that I can’t fully defeat him."},{"lineNumber":252967,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、俺も巨大化して対抗しよう。同じ大きさなら負けない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I’ll also grow huge to counter him. If we’re the same size, I won’t lose."},{"lineNumber":252968,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルはそんな魔法は知らない、クルックーも無いですねという","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheel said she doesn’t know such magic, and even Kurukku said there’s none like that."},{"lineNumber":252969,"originalJapaneseLine":"にやにやしているミラクル、自分に声がかかるのを待っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Miracle was grinning, waiting for someone to call on him."},{"lineNumber":252970,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨大化の魔法、ミラクルが知っている　３分間巨人になれる魔法、自分が作った","translatedEnglishLine":"The magic of growing huge, Miracle knows it—a spell to become a giant for three minutes, which he made himself."},{"lineNumber":252971,"originalJapaneseLine":"材料は手元にない、保存が聞かない物なのだ、このヘルマンの奥地ツングース平原に生えている","translatedEnglishLine":"The ingredients aren’t on hand; they’re perishable. They grow in the deep Tungus plains of Helman."},{"lineNumber":252972,"originalJapaneseLine":"２−４キノコだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Two to four mushrooms."},{"lineNumber":252973,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、それを取りにいこうとランス達は出かける","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, Lance and the others set out to fetch them."},{"lineNumber":252974,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、魔軍、バボラの部下達","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the demon army, Babora’s subordinates."},{"lineNumber":252975,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物将軍１体をバボラ親衛隊の隊長として出して下さい、性格任せます","translatedEnglishLine":"Please send out one monster general as the captain of Babora’s guards; personality is up to you."},{"lineNumber":252976,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼中心の愚痴で、状況説明とします","translatedEnglishLine":"Centered on him, complaints will serve as the situation explanation."},{"lineNumber":252977,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスからの作戦指示、バボラあたま悪いからなかなか理解出来ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Operational orders from Caybris, but Babora is stupid and can't understand them easily."},{"lineNumber":252978,"originalJapaneseLine":"大将軍ルメイからも指示が来ている、バボラをバカにした態度","translatedEnglishLine":"Orders also came from Great General Lumei, with a mocking attitude toward Babora."},{"lineNumber":252979,"originalJapaneseLine":"本来、魔人直轄の親衛隊の方が格上のはずなのにルメイが上から目線でムカツク","translatedEnglishLine":"Originally, the direct demon lord’s guards should be superior, but Lumei looks down on Babora, which is irritating."},{"lineNumber":252980,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンク様の部隊には下手に出ているらしいぜとかも","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, Babora acts submissively toward Kesselrink-sama’s troops as well."},{"lineNumber":252981,"originalJapaneseLine":"先日、人間の特攻部隊がバボラ様の足に取り付いて少し怪我をさせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The other day, a human suicide squad attached to Babora-sama’s foot and caused a slight injury."},{"lineNumber":252982,"originalJapaneseLine":"無敵結界のあるバボラ様が怪我など有り得ないのだが、何かの間違いかもしれない","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora-sama has an invincible barrier, so injury is impossible, maybe it was a mistake."},{"lineNumber":252983,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんにしろ人間どもにそこまで近づかれたのは我々のミス、以後、警戒を怠らないようにとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, it was our mistake to let humans get that close; don’t neglect vigilance in the future."},{"lineNumber":252984,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この魔物将軍、バボラが上司だし、バカだし、困っているが","translatedEnglishLine":"This monster general is troubled because Babora is his boss and is stupid."},{"lineNumber":252985,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それでも上司として守ろうとしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Still, he tries to protect him as his superior."},{"lineNumber":252986,"originalJapaneseLine":"　\t","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":252987,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラが起きる、うーーー、飯。飯まだか","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora wakes up, 'Uhhh, food... is it ready yet?'"},{"lineNumber":252988,"originalJapaneseLine":"さっき食べましたよー","translatedEnglishLine":"You just ate earlier."},{"lineNumber":252989,"originalJapaneseLine":"そっか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I see..."},{"lineNumber":252990,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーっと、何すればいいんだっけ？","translatedEnglishLine":"Um, what am I supposed to do again?"},{"lineNumber":252991,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、西の方角に進んで下さい、そ、そっちです。で人間達の砦があるので潰して下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, please advance westward, that’s right. There’s a human fortress there, so please crush it."},{"lineNumber":252992,"originalJapaneseLine":"あ、あーい、わかった。いってくるだー","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, okay, got it. I’m heading out."},{"lineNumber":252993,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラングバウの様子","translatedEnglishLine":"The situation in Langbau."},{"lineNumber":252994,"originalJapaneseLine":"ペルエレ","translatedEnglishLine":"Peruere."},{"lineNumber":252995,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはどうしたの、早く魔人やっつけてよ。怖いじゃない。","translatedEnglishLine":"What happened to Lance? Hurry and defeat the demon lord. It’s scary, you know."},{"lineNumber":252996,"originalJapaneseLine":"やっぱ逃げようよ・・（一人で逃げるのが怖いので巻き込もうとするペルエレ）","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s run away after all... (Peruere tries to involve others because she’s scared to run alone.)"},{"lineNumber":252997,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも何かあって逃げられない","translatedEnglishLine":"But if something happens, we won’t be able to escape."},{"lineNumber":252998,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーラが出てもいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s fine if Sheila steps out."},{"lineNumber":252999,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラングバウの様子","translatedEnglishLine":"The situation in Langbau."},{"lineNumber":253000,"originalJapaneseLine":"クリームは戦況を見ながら思う、魔軍の大軍に押されて確かに厳しい","translatedEnglishLine":"Cream thought while watching the battle situation that being pressed by the large demon army is certainly tough."},{"lineNumber":253001,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、先の革命で兵を失う数が少なく済んだおかげて持ちこたえている","translatedEnglishLine":"However, thanks to losing only a few soldiers in the previous revolution, they are holding out."},{"lineNumber":253002,"originalJapaneseLine":"もし革命がなく腐敗した軍部だと一撃で崩壊していたし、革命で多数の兵士が","translatedEnglishLine":"If there was no revolution and the corrupt military remained, they would have collapsed at once, and many soldiers in the revolution..."},{"lineNumber":253003,"originalJapaneseLine":"死んでいた場合も当然駄目だった、あの革命は奇跡の成功であった","translatedEnglishLine":"If many died, it would also have been a failure; that revolution was a miraculous success."},{"lineNumber":253004,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの革命で死んだ同志達の死を無駄にしない為にも我々は勝たねばいけない","translatedEnglishLine":"To not waste the deaths of comrades who died in that revolution, we must win."},{"lineNumber":253005,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、前線のヘルマン軍","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the Hermann army at the front lines."},{"lineNumber":253006,"originalJapaneseLine":"総司令官ヒューバート","translatedEnglishLine":"Commander-in-chief Hubert."},{"lineNumber":253007,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロレックス、ランスが来た事を知り喜ぶ","translatedEnglishLine":"Rolex was glad to hear that Lance had arrived."},{"lineNumber":253008,"originalJapaneseLine":"真田、なら例の作戦は不要になりますかね？","translatedEnglishLine":"Sanada asked, 'Then, is that certain plan unnecessary?'"},{"lineNumber":253009,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、継続して準備してくれ（落とし穴作戦の伏線）","translatedEnglishLine":"No, continue preparing it (foreshadowing of the pitfall plan)."},{"lineNumber":253010,"originalJapaneseLine":"雹が降ってくる平原、ファンタジーぽい謎の危険地帯","translatedEnglishLine":"A plain where hail falls, a mysterious dangerous area with a fantasy-like atmosphere."},{"lineNumber":253011,"originalJapaneseLine":"いていて、と降ってくるヒョウが痛い","translatedEnglishLine":"Ouch, ouch, the falling hail is painful."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍陣地の隙間をうまく通り抜けてランス達はバボラの足元まできた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others skillfully passed through the gaps in the demon army's stronghold and reached Babora's feet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃をしかけます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They launched an attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数ターンで自動的に戦闘終了（体力の半分も削れないイメージ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle ended automatically after several turns (they couldn't even cut half of the health).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、堅い足だ。なかなか倒せない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, tough legs. Can't seem to take them down easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラの声が上から聞こえる、んー、いたい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora's voice could be heard from above, 'Ugh, that hurts...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして動き出す。足がランス達の元から消えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then it started moving. The legs disappeared from where Lance and the others were.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・逃げやがる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... it's running away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追いかけようにも魔人バボラの歩幅は数十メートル、数歩であっというまに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if they tried to chase, demon Babora's stride was tens of meters; with a few steps, in no time...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠くにいかれてしましった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It had already gotten far away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうしているうちに魔物が周囲にどんどんやってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, monsters kept coming around increasingly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、らちがあかん、撤退
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, this is hopeless, retreat!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウに戻ったランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others returned to Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正攻法では魔人バボラを倒すのは難しい、うーんと考えるランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s difficult to defeat demon Babora by straightforward means; Lance thought hard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強さでは俺様の方が上だ、大きさだけの問題で倒しきれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m stronger than him; it’s just a matter of size that I can’t fully defeat him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、俺も巨大化して対抗しよう。同じ大きさなら負けない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I’ll also grow huge to counter him. If we’re the same size, I won’t lose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルはそんな魔法は知らない、クルックーも無いですねという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel said she doesn’t know such magic, and even Kurukku said there’s none like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: にやにやしているミラクル、自分に声がかかるのを待っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle was grinning, waiting for someone to call on him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大化の魔法、ミラクルが知っている　３分間巨人になれる魔法、自分が作った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magic of growing huge, Miracle knows it—a spell to become a giant for three minutes, which he made himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 材料は手元にない、保存が聞かない物なのだ、このヘルマンの奥地ツングース平原に生えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ingredients aren’t on hand; they’re perishable. They grow in the deep Tungus plains of Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２−４キノコだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two to four mushrooms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、それを取りにいこうとランス達は出かける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, Lance and the others set out to fetch them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍、バボラの部下達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the demon army, Babora’s subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍１体をバボラ親衛隊の隊長として出して下さい、性格任せます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please send out one monster general as the captain of Babora’s guards; personality is up to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼中心の愚痴で、状況説明とします
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Centered on him, complaints will serve as the situation explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスからの作戦指示、バボラあたま悪いからなかなか理解出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Operational orders from Caybris, but Babora is stupid and can't understand them easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍ルメイからも指示が来ている、バボラをバカにした態度
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Orders also came from Great General Lumei, with a mocking attitude toward Babora.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来、魔人直轄の親衛隊の方が格上のはずなのにルメイが上から目線でムカツク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, the direct demon lord’s guards should be superior, but Lumei looks down on Babora, which is irritating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンク様の部隊には下手に出ているらしいぜとかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, Babora acts submissively toward Kesselrink-sama’s troops as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先日、人間の特攻部隊がバボラ様の足に取り付いて少し怪我をさせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The other day, a human suicide squad attached to Babora-sama’s foot and caused a slight injury.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無敵結界のあるバボラ様が怪我など有り得ないのだが、何かの間違いかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora-sama has an invincible barrier, so injury is impossible, maybe it was a mistake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんにしろ人間どもにそこまで近づかれたのは我々のミス、以後、警戒を怠らないようにとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, it was our mistake to let humans get that close; don’t neglect vigilance in the future.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この魔物将軍、バボラが上司だし、バカだし、困っているが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This monster general is troubled because Babora is his boss and is stupid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも上司として守ろうとしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, he tries to protect him as his superior.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラが起きる、うーーー、飯。飯まだか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora wakes up, 'Uhhh, food... is it ready yet?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっき食べましたよー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You just ate earlier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そっか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーっと、何すればいいんだっけ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, what am I supposed to do again?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、西の方角に進んで下さい、そ、そっちです。で人間達の砦があるので潰して下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, please advance westward, that’s right. There’s a human fortress there, so please crush it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、あーい、わかった。いってくるだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, okay, got it. I’m heading out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウの様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The situation in Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペルエレ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peruere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはどうしたの、早く魔人やっつけてよ。怖いじゃない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happened to Lance? Hurry and defeat the demon lord. It’s scary, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱ逃げようよ・・（一人で逃げるのが怖いので巻き込もうとするペルエレ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s run away after all... (Peruere tries to involve others because she’s scared to run alone.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも何かあって逃げられない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But if something happens, we won’t be able to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラが出てもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s fine if Sheila steps out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウの様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The situation in Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリームは戦況を見ながら思う、魔軍の大軍に押されて確かに厳しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cream thought while watching the battle situation that being pressed by the large demon army is certainly tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、先の革命で兵を失う数が少なく済んだおかげて持ちこたえている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, thanks to losing only a few soldiers in the previous revolution, they are holding out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし革命がなく腐敗した軍部だと一撃で崩壊していたし、革命で多数の兵士が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there was no revolution and the corrupt military remained, they would have collapsed at once, and many soldiers in the revolution...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死んでいた場合も当然駄目だった、あの革命は奇跡の成功であった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If many died, it would also have been a failure; that revolution was a miraculous success.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの革命で死んだ同志達の死を無駄にしない為にも我々は勝たねばいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To not waste the deaths of comrades who died in that revolution, we must win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、前線のヘルマン軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the Hermann army at the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総司令官ヒューバート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Commander-in-chief Hubert.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロレックス、ランスが来た事を知り喜ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rolex was glad to hear that Lance had arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真田、なら例の作戦は不要になりますかね？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sanada asked, 'Then, is that certain plan unnecessary?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、継続して準備してくれ（落とし穴作戦の伏線）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, continue preparing it (foreshadowing of the pitfall plan).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雹が降ってくる平原、ファンタジーぽい謎の危険地帯
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A plain where hail falls, a mysterious dangerous area with a fantasy-like atmosphere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いていて、と降ってくるヒョウが痛い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ouch, ouch, the falling hail is painful.
